ch0356_10_zeiyu/0101_0701_01_10:
Wow, [Name:PlayerNickname ]—came to
say hi on your own, eh? Good, good!
ch0356_10_zeiyu/0101_0701_02_10:
Got any plans today? If not, I insist you hang
out with me!
ch0356_10_zeiyu/7101_0701_01_10:
It’s nice wearing a gorgeous outfit like this,
but I still feel like it’s missing something...
ch0356_10_zeiyu/7101_0701_02_10:
Maybe I need a mask? I always used to
wear one to the festivals in Kitakami!
ch0356_10_zeiyu/7101_0701_03_10:
I need one that’ll match who I am now...
Why don’t you choose one for me?
ch0356_10_zeiyu/7102_0701_01_10:
Pecharunt chucks strange mochi at people
and Pokémon to take control of them.
ch0356_10_zeiyu/7102_0701_02_10:
Anyone who eats the mochi becomes
Pecharunt’s underling.
ch0356_10_zeiyu/7102_0701_03_10:
Just thinking about it makes me angry!
It’s a million years too early for anyone to
control ME!
ch0356_10_zeiyu/7103_0701_01_10:
I really stand out with this gorgeous outfit
and natural beauty!
ch0356_10_zeiyu/7103_0701_02_10:
I bet anyone could spot me, even in
a crowd!
ch0356_10_zeiyu/7103_0701_03_10:
If you need to find someone, I give you
permission to use me as a landmark!
ch0356_10_zeiyu/7104_0701_01_10:
Nemona and the others never have a good
answer whenever I ask them what the secret
to their strength is...
ch0356_10_zeiyu/7104_0701_02_10:
I guess that means there aren’t shortcuts.
You just have to work at it little by little!
ch0356_10_zeiyu/7104_0701_03_10: Rushing won’t lead to anything useful.
ch0356_10_zeiyu/7104_0701_04_10: I’ll be the best someday...at my own pace!
ch0356_10_zeiyu/7105_0701_02_10: If you do, just say so! I won’t tell anyone!
ch0356_10_zeiyu/7105_0701_03_10:
I’ll never tell anyone mine... It’s the only
part of my perfect life that’s been marred!
ch0356_10_zeiyu/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, there you are! I have a present for you!
ch0356_10_zeiyu/1701_0702_01_10: It’s from me, which adds to its value!
ch0356_10_zeiyu/2501_0701_01_10:
What, are you mesmerized by me in my
special outfit? Hehe... Understandable.
ch0356_10_zeiyu/2501_0701_02_10:
With my skill in battle and natural charm,
I’ll make it straight to the top on Pasio!
ch0356_10_zeiyu/2501_0702_01_10:
What do you think? I’m looking even better
than a model, aren’t I?
ch0356_10_zeiyu/2501_0702_02_10:
Hey, don’t be difficult! Just nod and agree
with me!
ch0356_10_zeiyu/2511_0701_01_10:
My homeland, the Land of Kitakami, is really
special to me.
ch0356_10_zeiyu/2511_0701_02_10:
That’s why I feel icky when outsiders come
piling in from other places!
ch0356_10_zeiyu/2511_0701_03_10:
Well...I guess you’re OK. It wouldn’t bug me
if you stayed.
ch0356_10_zeiyu/2511_0702_01_10:
The Land of Kitakami is out in the
countryside. It doesn’t have any cool
hangouts or anything like that.
ch0356_10_zeiyu/2511_0702_02_10:
If you’re looking for a place to relax, come
visit sometime! You can even munch on
apples while you’re at it.
ch0356_10_zeiyu/3001_0701_01_10:
See? Waking up early has its perks.
You got to see me!
ch0356_10_zeiyu/3003_0701_01_10:
Got any snacks on you? Just no mochi cake,
please.
ch0356_10_zeiyu/3005_0701_01_10:
With the moon shining and me looking so
good, how could this not be the perfect shot?
Go ahead—capture it!
